## staff.Api interface

Entry point for staff to Smokeball.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface Api 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [all()](./smokeball-client-sdk.staff.api.all.md) | Gets all staff members. |
|  [get(staffId)](./smokeball-client-sdk.staff.api.get.md) | Gets the staff member associated to the specified staff id. |
|  [observe(callback)](./smokeball-client-sdk.staff.api.observe.md) | Creates a subscription for all staff. Check against the staff member you are interested in within your registered callback.<!-- -->To prevent doubling up of changes, notifications triggered by the staff update call will not be notified here.<!-- -->Only one subscription will be made per session. Regardless of how many times this function is called, the last registered callback will be used. |
